resources.string: おはよございます \n o-ha-yo go-za-i-ma-su \n good morning
こにちわ \n ko-ni-chi-wa \n good afternoon/hello
こんばんわ \n ko-n-ba-n-wa \n good evening
おやすみ \n o-ya-su-mi-na-sa-i \n good night
ごめなさい \n go-me-na-sai \n i am sorry

よろしくおねがいします 
 yo-ro-shi-ku o-ne-ga-i-shi-ma-su 
 please treat me well/
nice to meet you
おげんきですか \n o-ge-n-ki de-su \n how are you?
わかりました \n wa-ka-ri-ma-shi-ta \n i understand
わかりません \n wa-ka-ri-ma-se-n \n i do not understand
おなまえわなんですか \n o-na-ma-e wa na-n de-su ka \n what is your name?
おいくつ \n o-i-ku-tsu \n how old are you?
すみません \n su-mi-ma-se-n \n excuse me
はじめまして \n ha-ji-me-ma-shi-te \n nice to meet you
さよなら \n sa-yo-na-ra \n good bye
えきわどこですか \n e-ki wa do-ko de-su-ka \n where is the station?
これわいくらですか \n ko-re wa i-ku-ra de-su-ka \n how much is this?
それわいくらですか \n so-re wa i-ku-ra de-su-ka \n how much is that?
あれわいくらですか \n a-re wa i-ku-ra de-su-ka \n how is that (over there)?
じゃまた \n ja ma-ta \n see you soon
ありがとうございます \n a-ri-ga-to go-za-i-ma-su \n thank you
みずおねがいします \n mi-zu o-ne-ga-i-shi-ma-su \n water please
たすけてください \n ta-su-ke-te ku-da-sa-i \n help please
わいふぁいわむりょうですか \n wa-i-fu-a-i mu-ryo-u de-su ka? \n is the wi-fi free?
めにゅうおねがいします \n me-nyu-u o-ne-ga-i-shi-ma-su \n menu please
えいごのめにゅうおねがいします \n ei-go no me-nyu-u o-ne-ga-i-shi-ma-su \n do you have an english menu?
おかいけいをおねがいします \n o-ka-i-ke-i o o-ne-ga-i-shi-ma-su \n could i have the check please?
くれじっとかあどわつかえますか \n ku-re-ji-t-to ka-a-do wa tsu-ka-e-ma-su-ka \n do you take credit card?
しゃしんおとってもらえませんか \n sha-shi-n o to-t-te mo-ra-i-ma-se-n-ka \n could you take a picture for me please?
ちずありますか \n chi-zu a-ri-ma-su-ka \n could i get a map?
よやくをしたのですが \n yo-ya-ku o shi-ta no de-su ga \n i have a reservation
えいごをはなせえますか \n ei-go o ha-na-se-ma-su-ka? \n do you speak english?
これおください \n ko-re o ku-da-sa-i \n I would like this
